explanation: [0-0] On a green indoor soccer field, two men stand in the background. The blond man on the left wears a blue and white tracksuit and white shoes, while the man on the right, bending over and holding a tire, wears a pink shirt and black shoes. Between them is a red goalpost, and in front of them lies a tire on its side. Above them are three emojis, each with a white caption underneath. The emoji on the left is a young man, the one in the middle is a robot, and the one on the right is a tire.

[0-2] The goalpost in the upper left corner lights up blue, signaling the start of the match. The blond man quickly runs out as a soccer ball rolls out from the red goalpost between them. The man on the right also pushes his tire forward. Just as the rolling tire is about to hit the tire on the ground, the blond man gets to it first, touches it, and runs towards the right side of the screen. The caption under the young man's emoji changes to a white "1", indicating that the blond man scores a point. The rolling tire arrives second and continues rolling to the left.

[0-2] The goalpost in the upper left corner lights up blue, signaling the start of the match. The blond man quickly runs out as a soccer ball rolls out from the red goalpost between them. The man on the right also pushes his tire forward. Just as the rolling tire is about to hit the tire on the ground, the blond man gets to it first, touches it, and runs towards the right side of the screen. The caption under the young man's emoji changes to a white "1", indicating that the blond man scores a point. The rolling tire arrives second and continues rolling to the left.

[2-5] The goalpost in the upper left corner lights up, indicating the start of the second round. The blond man runs quickly, the soccer ball from the goalpost appears beside him, and the pink-shirted man's tire rolls out. The tire rolls quickly, reaching the target before the blond man can touch the tire on the ground. The caption under the tire emoji changes to a white "1", signifying the tire's victory in this round. The scene then switches to a full view of the pink-shirted man excitedly raising his arms overhead.

[5-8] The scene cuts back to show both men. As the goalpost in the upper left corner lights up, the third round begins. The blond man runs towards the tire on the ground, followed by the pink-shirted man jogging behind his rolling tire. The blond man quickly bends down, touches the tire, and runs towards the right side of the screen, laughing. The caption under the young man's emoji changes to a white "2", indicating his victory in this round. The rolling tire then reaches the target, and the pink-shirted man behind it watches in surprise, hands on his head, as the blond man runs off-screen to the right.

[8-13] The scene cuts back to the starting position. As the goalpost in the upper left corner lights up, the fourth round begins. This time, the soccer ball between the two men rolls out quickly and collides with the tire rolled by the pink-shirted man. The blond man slows down upon seeing this collision and reaches out with his left hand to grab the rolling tire. The pink-shirted man, after rolling out his tire, continues to jog behind it, bent over. The rolling tire, after knocking the soccer ball away, reaches the target first. The caption under the tire emoji changes to a white "2". The blond man and the soccer ball then disappear off-screen to the left. The pink-shirted man, seeing his tire reach the target, celebrates with clenched fists held at his sides and sits down on the ground.

The blond man, just starting to run, stops upon seeing the soccer ball reach the target. The tire has also just started rolling, with the pink-shirted man following behind. [20-25] The scene returns to the starting position. As the goalpost in the upper left corner lights up, the final round begins. The soccer ball shoots across the ground, hits the tire on the ground, and bounces off to the right. The caption under the robot emoji changes to a white "3", declaring the robot as the final winner. The blond man has only just taken a step, and the pink-shirted man, before he can even stabilize his rolling tire, is stunned by the soccer ball reaching the target. He then takes a stride and runs in front of the rolling tire. The tire continues rolling helplessly to the right. The scene finally switches to a full view of the two men. The blond man turns his head and walks away to the left, while the pink-shirted man watches the soccer ball bounce off to the right, then looks ahead with a blank expression. The rolling tire falls over behind him.
